snippet: The International Olympic Committee will consider dropping the Russian pole-vaulter Yelena Isinbayeva as an Olympic ambassador after her comments about gay people, President Jacques Rogge said.
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee will consider dropping the Russian pole-vaulter Yelena Isinbayeva as an Olympic ambassador after her comments about gay people, President Jacques Rogge said.

headline.main: I.O.C. to Consider Dropping Ambassador After Remarks
